fields.name: ErrorDis
fields.fieldText: There is a problem with this flow. Please report this to admin.

fields.name: TemplatedDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please Select from the pre-templated Pathology Requests below.

textTemplates.name: ErrorEmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


An error has occurred in the "Generate Pathology Form" Flow. The user was: {!$User.FirstName}
